name: Sprite folders
description: Adds folders to sprite lists, as well as costume and sound lists. To create a folder, right click any sprite and click "create folder". Click a folder to open or close it. Right click a sprite to see what folders you can move it to, or alternatively drag and drop it into an open folder.

info.text: Users with this feature enabled will be able to see the folders in your project. Anyone else will see sprite lists normally (no folders).
This feature works by adding "[folderName]//" at the beginning of the names for your sprites.
